links:
.section.header .inner{border-bottom:0}#body-content-inner{padding:0}#home{background:#FFF}#home-splash{position:relative;width:100%;height:460px;background:url(/web/20150616190923im_/https://www.cloudflare.com/media/images/home/splash.jpg) no-repeat top left;background-size:contain}#home-splash-video{display:none;position:relative;margin:auto;width:640px;height:360px;padding:50px 0;z-index:200}h2{font-size:32px}#home-splash-play span{display:none;text-indent:-1000px}.call-to-action{padding:40px 0}#home-features{background-color:white;border-top:1px solid #dedede}.video-wrapper{background:#fff}.column{width:20%;float:left}.column .inner{padding:20px}.column img{width:100%;-moz-border-radius:3px;-webkit-border-radius:3px;border-radius:3px}.column a.large-link{padding:20px 0 0 0;text-align:center;font-size:16px;color:#2f7bbf;width:100%;display:block}.column a.large-link.last{padding:20px 0 0 0}.column p{padding:10px 0 0 0;font-size:12px;text-align:center}.column p.last{padding:10px 0 0 0}@media(max-width:1000px){.column{width:50%}}@media(max-width:720px){#home-splash{height:180px;padding:20px 0;margin:auto;display:block}#home-splash-video{width:100%;height:180px;padding:20px 0}h2{font-size:24px}#home-features{border-top:0}.call-to-action{padding:0}.column{width:100%;float:none;border-top:1px solid #dedede;padding:30px 0}.column img{width:50%}.column h4{padding:10px 0 0 0}.column p{font-size:14px}}
